name: name

footer.text: ESCADO is a leading company in the field of logistics and transport. Our goal is to provide the best service to our customers and meet their logistical needs.

airwayDesc: Short delivery, high security, cheaper shipping cost
airwayDescription: Airway cargo transportation differs significantly from other types of transportation in terms of delivering the cargo to its owner in a short time.
roadwayDescription: Delivery by road differs in that it covers delivery from more than 30 countries.
waterwayDesc: China, Turkey, Iran, Georgia and more than 50 ports
waterwayDescription: China: LIANYUNGANG PORT, NANTONG PORT, ZHANGJIAGANG PORT, NANJING PORT Turkey: Amberli Port, Gebze Port, Gemlik Port, Istanbul Port, Izmir Port and more than 50 ports.

companyInfo.name: Escado
companyInfo.description: ESCADO COMPANY provides translation services worldwide at affordable rates. One of the main principles of our business is excellent customer service and translator quality. In addition, we offer 24/7 support to our customers. Our professional translators and support team are always ready to assist customers via email, phone, or live chat. Our tailored approach to each customer allows us to work with businesses of all sizes, from small businesses to Fortune 500 companies, government agencies, and leading legal and financial institutions worldwide.

customerFeedbacks.name: Orxan Humbatov
customerFeedbacks.feedback: Working with Escado not only saved me time but also earned me quality. Speed and quality.

customerFeedbacks.name: Murad Asadov
customerFeedbacks.feedback: I had worked with other companies before, but Escado surpassed me in terms of time.

customerFeedbacks.name: Veli Quluzade
customerFeedbacks.feedback: They researched the household appliance I wanted to buy and brought it to me at the cheapest price as soon as possible.

transportInfo.title: Logistics Service
transportInfo.description2: - Door-to-door delivery or delivery to the desired location
- Real-time information about the duration or direction of transportation

translateInfo.title: Translation Service
translateInfo.description1: - Opt for our translation services to enjoy precise, professional, and timely language solutions tailored to your needs
translateInfo.description2: - Select our translation service and experience accuracy, reliability, and cost-effectiveness that sets us apart
translateInfo.description3: - Make us your choice for translation services, where accuracy, affordability, and customer satisfaction are our top priorities

visaInfo.title: Visa Support
visaInfo.description3: - Arranging airfare at a reasonable price
